Rulings.Base:
1. This card does not target.
2. It cannot be activated during the Damage Step.
3. If you Chain this card to the activation of a monster effect, the effect will still resolve normally.
4. If "Drill Warrior" is removed from play by its own effect and then this card is activated, the effect of "Drill Warrior" to Special Summon itself and return a monster to your hand will resolve normally because they do not activate on the field.
5. "Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes" is unaffected by this card and will still gain Hyper Venom Counters.
